title: cannot display PDF from HPE site in windows 7 + firefox esr
content:

https://support.hpe.com/hpesc/public/docDisplay?docId=c01081836&docLocale=en_US

I get an empty pdf viewer frame. Also the debugger shows the following error;

Uncaught TypeError: Promise.withResolvers is not a function

Is there some way to overcome this problem? a future release of firefox esr?

title: Roboform Add-on
content:
Hi,

For the last 2 weeks or so Roboform task bar has not displayed on firefox. It works perfectly OK with Edge. I tried uninstalling and then reinstalling roboform without closing roboform and miraculously the task bar appeared attached to the bottom of the screen for the duration of the session. I thought the problem was fixed however, when I next restarted the PC it was again not present. Any ideas how to fix this as I do not wish to use edge.
creator: nickc3

title: 登录及账号同步问题
content: 我有两台设备，Mac Studio是（Apple M2 Maxsequoia15.4.1） 、iMac （Intel corei5 sequoia15.3.2）。 Mac Studio一直无法同步最新数据，重置密码后，iMac使用新密码可登录，iPhone可登录，Mac Studio无法登陆显示密码错误（用最早设置的密码反而可以登录）； 登录后书签无法同步，连账号头像都是不一样的..... 书签不同步！ 以及这个论坛也特别难用。

title: Very low sound volume in YouTube
content:

I reinstalled Firefox and rebooted the computer - still has the problem.

I'm using Windows 11 24H2 (home) on my desktop.
